name: Guppy Guardian
description:
Guppy Guardian v1.0 was made by Fantactic(2d art & coding) and ImmortalityBH(music, ui, and misc coding tasks)

for the GMTK "Only One" 2019 Game Jam

with "Only one" goldfish fitting the theme loosely

Controls:

Escape - return to menu then quit
Tab - toggle work panel(while in this mode press any key to earn money for fish food)
Left Click - interaction

Hints:

 throw the cat toy to distract the cat, press tab + any key to earn money, and 
click and shake the fish food container to feed the fish.

Our Scores: Fantactic: 118 ImmortalityBH: 52 Try to beat us!
